name: The Fool
description: Symbolizes new beginnings, freedom, and fearlessness.
relationshipAdvice: Fear of uncertainty holds you back; take the first leap of faith toward love.
careerAdvice: Your adventurous spirit calls for change; now is a good time to explore new job opportunities.
healingAdvice: Release fear of the unknown and trust the journey ahead to begin healing.

name: The Magician
relationshipAdvice: Doubting your own power stalls progress; harness your will to pursue love.
careerAdvice: Your skills and initiative make now ideal to manifest a new career path.
healingAdvice: Release self-doubt and use your inner resources to empower your healing.

name: The High Priestess
description: Symbolizes intuition, mystery, and inner wisdom.
relationshipAdvice: Ignoring your intuition blocks connection; trust your inner voice in relationships.
careerAdvice: Reflection over action is advised; wait for clarity before changing jobs.
healingAdvice: Release hidden doubts by listening inward and let your intuition guide healing.

name: The Empress
description: Represents abundance, the Earth mother, and nurturing.
relationshipAdvice: Neglecting self-care prevents love; nurture yourself to attract the right partner.
careerAdvice: Opportunities for growth abound; consider new roles that foster abundance now.
healingAdvice: Release self-neglect by nurturing your needs with compassion to heal.

name: The Emperor
relationshipAdvice: Fear of taking control stalls progress; set clear boundaries and lead with confidence.
careerAdvice: Stability calls for patience; staying may yield the promotion you seek.
healingAdvice: Release chaos by establishing order and reclaim control to heal.

name: The Hierophant
relationshipAdvice: Resisting shared values blocks commitment; embrace tradition to move forward.
careerAdvice: Learning within existing structures may pay off; waiting could bring promotion.
healingAdvice: Release doubt in guidance and seek wisdom from mentors for healing.

name: The Lovers
relationshipAdvice: Fear of making the wrong choice stalls you; trust your heart and decide honestly.
careerAdvice: A pivotal choice awaits; follow your values if considering a new job now.
healingAdvice: Release guilt over past decisions and choose self-love to begin healing.

name: The Chariot
relationshipAdvice: Lacking direction holds you back; set goals and move forward with determination.
careerAdvice: Your drive supports a change now; harness confidence to advance your career.
healingAdvice: Release passivity by taking charge of your emotions to heal.

name: Strength
description: Symbolizes courage, patience, and inner strength.
relationshipAdvice: Doubting your courage stops intimacy; practice gentle confidence to connect.
careerAdvice: Your resilience favors new challenges; now is a good time for a career move.
healingAdvice: Release harsh self-judgment and show yourself compassion to heal.

name: The Hermit
relationshipAdvice: Neglecting reflection hides your needs; spend time alone to know what you want.
careerAdvice: Reflection over action is wise; wait until you’re clear on goals before changing jobs.
healingAdvice: Release distractions by seeking solitude and inner guidance to heal.

name: Wheel of Fortune
relationshipAdvice: Clinging to old patterns blocks new love; embrace change and trust fate.
careerAdvice: Fortune favors action; now is a good time to explore new career paths.
healingAdvice: Release resistance to life’s cycles and flow with change to heal.

name: Justice
description: Represents balance, justice, and cause and effect.
relationshipAdvice: Avoiding accountability stalls growth; act with fairness to move forward.
careerAdvice: If your efforts have been balanced, staying could yield promotion; weigh options carefully.
healingAdvice: Release imbalance by owning your actions and seeking forgiveness to heal.

name: The Hanged Man
description: Symbolizes sacrifice, epiphany, and new perspectives.
relationshipAdvice: Resisting pause prevents insight; surrender control and gain new perspective.
careerAdvice: Wait for clarity rather than rushing; a new viewpoint will guide your decision.
healingAdvice: Release the need to force outcomes and allow time for healing insights.

name: Death
relationshipAdvice: Fear of endings blocks new love; accept closure to open your heart.
careerAdvice: Transformation is at hand; now is the time to pursue new career opportunities.
healingAdvice: Release old patterns fully and embrace rebirth to start healing.

name: Temperance
relationshipAdvice: Impatience disturbs harmony; practice moderation to attract balanced love.
careerAdvice: Patience and balance suggest waiting for that promotion rather than jumping ship.
healingAdvice: Release extremes and integrate balance into your life for steady healing.

name: The Devil
description: Represents bondage, desire, and the shadow side.
relationshipAdvice: Attachments to toxic patterns hold you back; break free to find true love.
careerAdvice: If you feel trapped, a job change now may free you more than waiting would.
healingAdvice: Release self-imposed chains by confronting your shadows to heal.

name: The Tower
relationshipAdvice: Fear of upheaval stalls growth; embrace disruption to rebuild stronger love.
careerAdvice: Upheaval is at hand; a job switch now could spark new opportunities.
healingAdvice: Release attachment to old structures and allow collapse to clear the way for healing.

name: The Star
relationshipAdvice: Losing hope inhibits connection; rekindle optimism to attract the right partner.
careerAdvice: Your inspiration is high; now is a good moment to pursue a new career path.
healingAdvice: Release despair and focus on hope to guide your healing.

name: The Moon
description: Symbolizes the subconscious, illusions, and intuition.
relationshipAdvice: Hidden fears block intimacy; confront illusions and seek clarity in love.
careerAdvice: Uncertainty suggests waiting; clarify your path before changing jobs.
healingAdvice: Release illusions by shining light on hidden doubts to heal.

name: The Sun
relationshipAdvice: Neglecting joy prevents attraction; embrace positivity to find the right partner.
careerAdvice: Your confidence shines; now is an excellent time to pursue new career opportunities.
healingAdvice: Release pessimism and bask in optimism to foster healing.

name: Judgement
relationshipAdvice: Avoiding self-evaluation stalls love; reflect and forgive to move forward.
careerAdvice: A pivotal moment calls for decision; now is the time to choose your next step.
healingAdvice: Release guilt through self-forgiveness to awaken deeper healing.

name: The World
relationshipAdvice: Fear of completion holds you back; celebrate achievements to open your heart.
careerAdvice: Having achieved much, now is a good time to seek new horizons rather than wait.
healingAdvice: Release resistance to closure and embrace completion to heal fully.
